Content:: Coordinates: 75°N 140°W﻿ / ﻿75°N 140°W﻿ / 75; -140 The Canada Basin is a deep oceanic basin within the Arctic Ocean.[1][2][3][4][5][6][7] It is part of the Amerasian Basin and lies off the coast of Alaska and northwest Canada between the Chukchi Plateau north of Alaska and the Alpha Ridge north of Ellesmere Island. This Arctic-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
